page.title: 03Farming
page.content: The land around Rhynie is all farming ground so there is many farms. most are crofts but there are a few bigger farms. Most cattle are sold for beef but some are sold for stock. The two main breeds of cattle are Hereford and Charlois. A lot of sheep stay up in the hills so they have to be hardy. The breeds are Blackface and Texel. Pigs aren't very common in this area. Infact only two farms have pigs. The crops are mainly winter and spring barley, silage, hay, and vegetables. One farm has started growing Oil Seed Rape.
